game.name: Barrok 2
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Race high-speed sportscars in time-based challenges or against AI opponents. Master the track, beat the clock, and prove your skills in fast, arcade-focused races.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Race high-speed sportscars in time-based challenges or against AI opponents. Master the track, beat the clock, and prove your skills in fast, arcade-focused races.
